info.title: Exact Online REST API
info.description:
The Exact Online REST API provides programmatic access to Exact Online ERP/accounting data. It uses OData v2.0 conventions and OAuth 2.0 for authentication.

Key capabilities include:
- CRM management (accounts, contacts)
- Financial administration (general ledger, journals)
- Sales processing (orders, invoices)
- Purchase management (purchase orders)
- Logistics and inventory (items)
- Cashflow and payments
- Webhook subscriptions for real-time event notifications

Most endpoints require a division parameter identifying which administration to access. Retrieve the current division via `/current/Me`. The default page size is 60 records; bulk and sync endpoints return up to 1000.

tags.name: System
tags.description: System endpoints for current user, divisions, and user management

tags.name: CRM
tags.description: Customer relationship management: accounts and contacts

tags.name: Financial
tags.description: Financial administration: general ledger accounts and journals

tags.name: Logistics
tags.description: Logistics and inventory: items and item groups

tags.name: Webhooks
tags.description: Webhook subscriptions for real-time event notifications

get.description: Returns profile information and division details for the currently authenticated user. Use `$select=CurrentDivision` to retrieve the division number required by most other endpoints.
Returns divisions accessible to the authenticated user within the current license.
Returns all divisions across the license, including those not directly accessible to the authenticated user.
Returns system users. This endpoint does not accept a division parameter; supplying one returns 501 Not Implemented.
Returns CRM accounts (customers, suppliers, prospects). Scope: crm.accounts.

post.description: Creates a new CRM account. The Name field is mandatory.

get.description: Returns a single CRM account by its GUID.

delete.description: Deletes a CRM account by its GUID.

get.description: Returns CRM contacts. Each contact belongs to an account. Scope: crm.accounts.

post.description: Creates a new CRM contact. The Account field is mandatory.

get.description: Returns a single CRM contact by its GUID.

delete.description: Deletes a CRM contact by its GUID.

get.description: Returns general ledger accounts. Scope: financial.generalledger.

post.description: Creates a new GL account. The Code field is mandatory.

get.description: Returns a single GL account by its GUID.

delete.description: Deletes a GL account by its GUID.

get.description: Returns financial journals. Scope: financial.generalledger.
Returns sales orders. Available for Manufacturing and Wholesale & Distribution packages. Scope: sales.salesorders.

post.description: Creates a new sales order. The SalesOrderLines array is mandatory when creating.

get.description: Returns a single sales order by its GUID.

put.description: Updates an existing sales order. SalesOrderLines is not required for updates.

delete.description: Deletes a sales order by its GUID.

get.description: Returns sales invoices. Scope: sales.salesinvoices.

post.description: Creates a new sales invoice. The SalesInvoiceLines array is mandatory when creating.

get.description: Returns a single sales invoice by its GUID.

put.description: Updates an existing sales invoice. SalesInvoiceLines is not required for updates.

delete.description: Deletes a sales invoice by its GUID.

get.description: Returns purchase order lines. Available for Manufacturing, Professional Services, and Wholesale & Distribution packages. Scope: purchase.purchaseorders.

post.description: Creates a new purchase order line.

get.description: Returns logistics items (products/services). Use the CustomDescriptionLanguage header for language-specific descriptions. Scope: logistics.items.
Returns a single logistics item by its GUID.

delete.description: Deletes a logistics item by its GUID.

get.description: Returns cashflow payment records.
Returns active webhook subscriptions for the current application.

post.description: Creates a new webhook subscription for receiving real-time notifications on resource changes.

exact_online_oauth.description: OAuth 2.0 authorization code flow for Exact Online. Register your application at https://apps.exactonline.com/ to obtain a Client ID and Client Secret. Access tokens are valid for 600 seconds (10 minutes). Refresh tokens are valid for 1 year.

scopes.financial.generalledger: Access general ledger accounts, journals, and chart of accounts
scopes.financial.accounting: Access financial transactions, entries, and reporting
scopes.sales.salesorders: Access sales orders and order lines
scopes.sales.salesinvoices: Access sales invoices and invoice lines
scopes.purchase.purchaseorders: Access purchase orders and order lines
scopes.logistics.items: Access logistics items, item groups, and inventory
scopes.organization.workflow: Access organization workflow, activities, and tasks

DivisionParam.name: division
DivisionParam.description: The division number (administration) to access. Retrieve via `GET /current/Me?$select=CurrentDivision`.

GuidIdParam.name: id
GuidIdParam.description: The GUID identifier of the resource.

SelectParam.name: $select
SelectParam.description: Comma-separated list of properties to include in the response.

FilterParam.name: $filter
FilterParam.description: OData filter expression (e.g., `Name eq 'Acme'`, `Modified gt datetime'2024-01-01'`).

TopParam.name: $top
TopParam.description: Maximum number of records to return. Default is 60.

SkipParam.name: $skip
SkipParam.description: Number of records to skip for pagination.

OrderByParam.name: $orderby
OrderByParam.description: Comma-separated list of properties to sort by (e.g., `Name asc`, `Modified desc`).

BadRequest.description: Bad request -- invalid parameters, filter expression, or request body

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized -- invalid, expired, or missing access token

Forbidden.description: Forbidden -- insufficient scope or permissions for the requested resource

NotFound.description: Not found -- the requested resource does not exist

Me.description: Current authenticated user profile and division information

CurrentDivision.description: Division number for use in API request URLs

DivisionCustomerCode.description: Owner account code of the division

DivisionCustomerName.description: Owner account name of the division

CustomerCode.description: Account code of the logged-in user

Customer.description: Customer GUID the user belongs to (from CRM Accounts)

UserTypeCode.description: User type code that determines role and rights

UserDivisionList.description: Comma-separated list of division codes the user can access

EndDate.description: Date after which the user is inactive

Account.description: CRM account representing a customer, supplier, or prospect

Status.description: Account status: C=Customer, S=Supplier, P=Prospect, N=None

Contact.description: CRM contact belonging to an account

Account.description: Account GUID the contact belongs to (mandatory)

Code.description: Unique code of the GL account (mandatory)

Compress.description: Whether transactions are compressed in reports

SalesOrderLines.description: Order lines (mandatory on POST, optional on PUT)

SalesOrderLine.description: Individual line item within a sales order

AmountFC.description: Total in foreign currency including VAT

AmountFCExclVat.description: Total in foreign currency excluding VAT

SalesInvoiceLines.description: Invoice lines (mandatory on POST, optional on PUT)

SalesInvoiceLine.description: Individual line item within a sales invoice

WebhookSubscription.description: Webhook subscription for receiving real-time notifications

CallbackURL.description: URL that receives webhook POST notifications

__next.description: URL for the next page of results
